downloadTitle: Creating Exchange Rate Providers for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012
downloadDescription: This document explains how to create new .NET and X++ exchange rate providers.

downloadFile.name: Creating Exchange Rate Providers for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/1/6/9/169a5966-4f18-4076-9ca4-56b2bd608645/Creating Exchange Rate Providers for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.pdf

detailsSection: This document contains code examples to help developers create exchange rate providers in .NET or X++, based on the preference and skills of each developer. Also, since there are no limits to the method the exchange rate providers use to get exchange rates, some interesting scenarios that are possible with the framework are offered.
detailsSection_file_name: Creating Exchange Rate Providers for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the manual in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
